titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-679, by Mr. Newhouse.
Provides for further amendments to H.R. 2.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 145.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 900.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 900.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 189 (Roll no. 190).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 188 (Roll no. 191).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2 (Agriculture and Nutrition Act of 2018).
